text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Well～～ here it comes! The exciting summer training!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
But～…… We mustn't stay on cloud nine like this! 
Right? Trainer!

Yes…… it is a training training after all, 
but this time I heard there's an event that's going to be held 
here.

There's going to be a race using the beach as the track… 
And Kawakami Princess is going to be participating.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
The movie helped me reminded me of something very important! 
Today, I will demonstrate the summer bond between a princess 
and a prince!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text:
―Well well. I can smell the commoners! Smells like low-class 
croquettes! The smell of croquettes that will never taste like 
croquettes from the best restaurants for the rest of their lives!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Oh, you are! The Dark Princess…… You're 
that mean one from the other day!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text: Are you going to race today? I don't think you should. Because I'm running in the race too.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text:
Fufufu……… Remember what happened the other day? Have 
you not learned your lessons? You're no match 
for a true princess like me. You'd better back off…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
……No! I'm definitely going to race! As a fighter princess, 
with my future prince!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text:
…Hmph! You're not learning at all. All right…… but this time 
I'm going to trample you down!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
……Honestly, my groundwork is not as good as hers. I learned 
that the other day racing her. It's frustrating but…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I…… don't want to run away! I want to win for sure! So let's 
work together and win this race!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Well then, let's have a strategy meeting right away! 
The first thing we need to decide is…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
―The name of the strategy! "The Princess and the 
Prince's ☆ Thrilling Big Eater Operation" or "The Bond Between Two! Operation Storm that Calls for Victory". 
These are my two suggestions!
After the meeting ended the race began under the hot sun!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
―Whoo, whoo……! 
Uryaaaaa～～～～!!!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text:
Well, well, well……! For all that confidence, I wonder if you 
stamina can keep up……!?

text_block_list.name: Student Commentator
text_block_list.text:
―Here we are in the mid section of the race! The stamina drain 
will be harsher than usual under the hot sun! Let's see who can pull out of this!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text:
Ha, ha, aghgh ……! I'll be taking the lead here! 
―OH NOOOOOOOO!
From the back of the leading pack, she quickly picked up speed…… and passed that Uma Musume!

text_block_list.name: Student Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The goal is close! Is the winner decided!? 
Oh!?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ―Seyaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!

text_block_list.name: Student Commentator
text_block_list.text:
And here comes Kawakami-chan breaking away from the lead 
pack! 
What a powerful run!!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text:
Unghh ……! How is this possible, she is weak! 
Where did that energy come from…!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Uriaaaah!!! Princess Accel― 
Times a trillion!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Student Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Kawakami-chan, she's in the lead! 
The finish line is in sight! 
Who's gonna be the crowned winner――!?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text:
Ha, ha, you must be kidding me……! 
The one who wins should be, should be… The true……!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ―I am the princess posessing the bond!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Student Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Goal! First place goes to ……Kawakami-chan! She wins by a 
nose length!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
………! 
Yaaaaaaaayyyy!!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text:
Agh…… Unbelievable～～～～! ! 
I can't believe I lost……!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ……I know your tactics. I also know that you are good at pulling away from the back of the pack in the final leg.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text: Wh, what!?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
My trainer helped me analyze your strategies. 
After all, I did lose to you once.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
When you have given your all, I use my weapon― 
my remaining power ―to return the favor! 
That was our strategy.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
We call it "Princess Power Times One Trillion Billion! Operation 
'Blast the Dark Princesses with True Bonds'"!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
―But! Even after all that hard work and planning, I still came 
up short in the end! You are so fast!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text: …Hmph… I don't need any consolation…!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Nope! No sides when the race is over! 
Those are Pri-Fi's words! 
From today on, you are my rival!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text: …… Hmph, what's with the Pri-Fi. I'm long out of that―

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
? ! Are you a Pri-Fi fan as well?! No wonder your lines 
sounded like a dark princess……!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Ringlets
text_block_list.text:
N, no! Don't get me wrong! 
I just watched a little bit when I was a kid while eating a 
croquette…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yay, yay ……～! The bond between the princess and the 
prince triumphs～～!

At night, on a sandy beach…… with just the two of us, 
Kawakami Princess was unreservedly exploding with the joy of her victory.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
……Oh yeah! Trainer!! I've always wanted to do this one thing 
If I win! May I?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, I'll tell you then! That…… last scene from the movie we saw the other night! I'd like to recreate it with the two of us!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yes! The scene where the princess and the prince talking 
to each other on their way back after saving the Earth from the battle on the moon!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Let's see……… Okay, well, here we go!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: '……Prince. We did it…… We saved the Earth…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: '……but this is not the end. They're all waiting for us on Earth!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
No matter what kind of battle it is, I will overcome it! 
Because…… I'm with my very own prince!"

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
……Ku～～～! The bond between the princess and the prince is 
extraordinarily strong～～!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (…… And my prince of destiny is…… right in front of me!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Fufufu ……! With the power of our bond, 
we will continue to create miracles!
